alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lander County through 400 PM PDT... At 322 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of New Pass Summit, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lander County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
